Articles.Content:
Does anyone have any links to guides for going interplanetary from orbit (or technically surface) of the Mun or Minmus?

Having set up a refueling outpost around Minmus I finally got round to trying this today and nothing worked quite how I predicted it to. Bit drunk and tired so maybe I'm just being an idiot, but yeah, a tutorial link or a pretty picture or something would be awesome
Scott Manley has a video on this:
Ah nice one, exactly what I was looking for sir!
